ProductDetail.PageTitle: The Little Barmaid DVD from makitCommerce
ProductDetail.MetaDescription: The Little Barmaid DVD from makitCommerce
ProductDetail.ProductShortDescription: A fabulous tale of a Barmaid who wants to get out of her bar and be a famous actress.
ProductDetail.ProductLongDescription: A fantastic DVD version of The Little Barmaid. A brilliant tale of a Barmaid who wants to get out of her bar and be a famous actress. Contains some semi-famous people dressed as fish. Not recommended for dogs or cats.
